title: Add CSV export for skills matrix
description: Allow users to export the skills matrix to CSV/Excel format for reporting and sharing. Should include all visible columns based on current filters.

title: Squash ci: commits in recent git history
description: Clean up git history by squashing the multiple ci: commits into fewer, more meaningful commits for a cleaner history.

title: Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
description:
Create GitHub Actions workflow that:
1. Runs linters (ESLint for frontend/backend)
2. Runs tests (Jest backend, Vitest frontend)
3. Builds and deploys to Azure Container Apps on push to main

Secrets needed in GitHub:
- AZURE_CREDENTIALS (service principal JSON)
- AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
- ACR_LOGIN_SERVER
- ACR_USERNAME
- ACR_PASSWORD

Target: rg-teamskills-prod in Central US
notes: Implemented CI/CD pipeline. Commit: 5f37022. User needs to add GitHub secrets: AZURE_CREDENTIALS and ACR_LOGIN_SERVER

title: PostgreSQL server stopped - app stuck on loading
description: Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server (psql-gvojq4dgzbtk4) was auto-stopped, causing the app to hang on 'Loading matrix...' with ETIMEDOUT errors. Need to start the server and consider configuring auto-pause settings or adding a health check that surfaces DB connectivity issues to users.
notes: Started PostgreSQL server with: az postgres flexible-server start. Server was auto-stopped (likely cost saving feature). App now working.
